product_name: Imagine Surf Mission GC Stand Up Paddle Board - 12' 6"
long_description: With a sleek displacement hull and plum bow, the Mission GC is the perfect design for touring, fitness and adventure paddling, and it'll keep up with the pack on those weekend race days.
short_description: With a sleek displacement hull and plum bow, the Mission GC is the perfect design for touring, fitness and adventure paddling, and it'll keep up with the pack on those weekend race days.
